00028 #include "qep_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"

00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qfsm_ini)

00037 //............................................................................
00038 QFsm::~QFsm() {
00039 }
00040 //............................................................................
00041 void QFsm::init(QEvent const *e) {
00042     QS_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00043 
00044     QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_INIT, QS::smObj_, this)
00045         QS_OBJ_(this);                            // this state machine object
00046         QS_FUN_((QStateHandler)0);       // the source (not defined for a FSM)
00047         QS_FUN_(m_state);                      // the target of the transition
00048     QS_END_()
00049 
00050                                     // execute the top-most initial transition
00051     Q_ALLEGE((*m_state)(this, e) == Q_RET_TRAN);   // transition must be taken
00052 
00053     (void)QEP_TRIG_(m_state, Q_ENTRY_SIG);                 // enter the target
00054 
00055     QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_INIT_TRAN, QS::smObj_, this)
00056         QS_TIME_();                                              // time stamp
00057         QS_OBJ_(this);                            // this state machine object
00058         QS_FUN_(m_state);                              // the new active state
00059     QS_END_()
00060 }
